title: Viral Video Showing Medical Staff Cheering is Not From New Zealand
subtitle: New Zealand Corona Patient Video Fact Check: A video showing healthcare workers in Italy cheering after the COVID ward in a hospital was closed following the recovery of the last patient is being shared as that from a New Zealand hospital.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video showing healthcare workers in Italy cheering after the COVID ward in a hospital was closed following the recovery of the last patient is being shared as that from a New Zealand hospital.

It is noteworthy that on 8 June, New Zealand was declared corona-free with Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern announcing that the country would go back to business as usual after the recovery of its last coronavirus patient.

However, the viral video which is being shared on social media is not from New Zealand but from Italy.
